channel.title: RSCA's Sleep Method
channel.description:
Hey guys,
So for the past few days I've been working on ripping rsca's sleep method from their client and server and implementing them into rscd v25. I've got the server side functioning properly I believe. The client side however is being a little more complicated..
When I use sleeping bag, the words don't appear in box, when i click "click here to get a different word" it sits at please wait... and doesn't give a new word when I type in the word and press enter to stop sleeping it sits at please wait...
any ideas or hints to fix these?

item.title: RSCA's Sleep Method
item.dc:creator: @RSCDevil RSCDevil
item.description:
@RSCDevil wrote:

I’ve got the server and client working… now i just need to figure out how to create a user and log in… their hash is different from rscd so idk how to set a password.

Read full topic

item.title: RSCA's Sleep Method
item.dc:creator: @RSCDevil RSCDevil
item.description:
@RSCDevil wrote:

vortex:

not really since you didnt post the code

id have to post the whole mudclient then lol…

Ill just try and see if I can get rsca’s client running again… Im stuck with this error message tho…
when I enter the defs folder its empty… probably why its throwing the error at me

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: defs/ItemDef Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: defs.ItemDef at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:306) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:247) Could not find the main class: org.rscangel.client.mudclient. Program will exit . Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
